workList.name: The New Core Analytics System
describeList: By collecting user interaction records with the New Core Cloud system and presenting them on the website in the form of tables and charts, we aim to statistically analyze the usage of the New Core Cloud system.
technicalList: Built the website using Webpack and vue-cli.
